transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ha Nakib ji bol rahe hain?
Executive: Nakib baat kar rahe hain Nakib ji baat karte hain kya?
Customer: ha main Prakash baat kar raha hun main Indiamart se
Executive: ji sir abhi aapka haidar laga ke company ka hum logon ne renewal kiya tha ek saal ka
Customer: nahi
Executive: to sir isse kya samasya aa raha hai ki aap baar baar service activation ke liye sir isko ticket open kar de rahe hain sir
Customer: sir maine mana kar diya maine bola mere ko business nahi karna Indiamart pe sir payment refund karao
Executive: theek hai sir
Customer: sir main samajh gaya aapki baat ki aapko nahi karna lekin sir jab paisa bhi diya hua to koi baat samajh ke ki kuch samajh ke ke to aapne invest kiya hoga sir Indiamart pe hai na
Customer: are wo thoda behka diya gaya jo jisne bharwa jo mam the na unhone mere ko behka diya tha
Customer: barobar ke apne jo kya bolte hain inquiry ye sab band ho inquiry bhi band ho jayegi wo band ho jayegi lekin wo aisa hota nahi hai sir inquiry band thodi na hoti hai agar wo to lifetime chalu rehti hai
Executive: kisne bol diya sir bilkul nahi hoga aapko inquiry nahi milega sir lifetime sir free mein services sir kaise rahega aapka services free free chalegi to kaise rahega sir aapka nahi rahega sir
Customer: ha to sir nahi mere ko nahi karna Indiamart pe sir payment refund kara do sir nahi karna mere ko
Executive: are sir aap aise insan hote hain jo service use nahi karta to main sir aapka karwa deta sorry sorry sir aap mahine ke 30 din mein se mahine ke 20 25 main bol raha hun mahine
Customer: ke 30 din mein se aap 25 26 din Indiamart open karte hain use karte hain call uthate hain lead manager se reply karte hain aapko kya
Customer: sahi utha ka kya kare abhi sare lead uthane ka man hi nahi hota sir aise lead padegi to kya karna hai yaar dikat aa raha hai isliye to bol raha hun sir
Executive: kya dikat aa raha hai dikat bina sir call karega to kya hoga maine dusre din hi call kiya tha sir maine maine bharwa dusre din hi call kiya tha sir
Customer: lekin aapki company wale to sunte nahi hai sir
Executive: main sun raha hun na sir aap batao to kya dikat aa raha hai koi nahi sunta koi nahi sunta sir nahi maine bola to sahi sir mere ko refund chahiye sir mere ko nahi karna business mere ko refund chahiye payment
Executive: sir business man hai sir aapko business meri baat suno account manager ho aap samjho aap AC manager ho sir aap samjhoge barobar sir
Executive: sir main sari cheeze samajh raha hun aur aap bhi samajh rahe hain aap sir maine bhi kisi ke paas se meri baat suno uchi udhar karke maine bhara hua hai barobar sir
Customer: hmm hmm
Customer: maine kisi ke paas se leke sir loan leke bhara hua hai sir
Executive: sir ye kaisi baat aapne loan leke bhara hua hai
Customer: ha sir
Executive: kaisi baat kar rahe hain sir aap
Customer: to fir aap
Executive: abhi main bol raha hun sir ha sir sir dekhiye agar aap real cheez batayenge to main aapki madad kar dunga sir is cheez mein hai na aap bataye takleef kahan aa raha hai sir ek saal use kiya takleef aa raha hai to to sir main bar bar call kar raha hun takleef aa raha hai to to call karta hun main sir
Executive: are malik ye to bataye business convert nahi ho raha lead to aa raha lead utha rahe ho lead mein quantity acha karna hai koi city acha karna hai conversion nahi aa raha to wahan ka dikat batao dikat to batao kya dikat aa raha hai
Customer: are nahi sir dikat hai isliye to main bol raha hun sir mere ko nahi karna business sir payment mere ko refund karao sir mere ko business nahi karna sir
Executive: sir aap dekho na baar baar wahi cheez kar raha hun main baar baar wahi cheez bol raha hun fir sir fayda kya hota hai na aapka koi fayda ho raha hai na mera koi fayda ho raha hai
Customer: ha to fir mere ko return karwa do sir nahi karna mere ko
Executive: return karne ke liye mujhe reason chahiye na sir kis baat pe return kar do sir hum Indiamart se services de rahe hain sir main aapko return kar do to uska reason hona chahiye na kya reason hai main kyun karu aapko return
Customer: to reason hai to wo to bol raha hun sir reason hai reason hai to wo to bol raha hun main aapko bol kyun nahi rahe ho kya hai bolo nahi mere ko return chahiye sir mere ko koi baat nahi sunni mere ko return chahiye payment reason kya hai sir reason kya hai reason kya hai
Executive: to reason hai isliye to bol raha hun sir ke teen mahine se kuch bhi nahi hai sir
Customer: business convert nahi ho raha ye reason hai
Customer: ha to business jo business hai wo to lead are jo business hai wo to lead padti nahi hai sir to fir matlab thodi na koi bharke sir
Executive: are sir chalo abhi aap mere samne char customer open main aapko dekho main kaise business nahi aa raha aap char customer
Customer: are nahi lagana sir mere ko sir nahi lagana mere kisi ko nahi lagana sir
Executive: to sir fir aap nahi baaten bana ke koi matlab nahi sir mere ko nahi mere ko return karwao sir mere ko nahi karna aapko bola to sahi hai sir main 10 bar bol chuka hun 20 bar bol chuka hun sir mere ko nahi karna business sir agar maine are nahi karni mere ko use nahi karni mere ko return chahiye payment return are payment return kya hai sir mere ko
Executive: sir kaise return kara do sir main return nahi kara are aapki company mein bhi baat kar chuka hun main
Executive: kis se baat ki aapne kis se baat ki aapne
Customer: aapke jo company Indiamart jo 9696 wala number hai na usse bhi main baat kar chuka sir ha to reason hai isliye bata raha hun sir ki main aapko reason likh ke du sir
Executive: bilkul sir aap mujhe batana padega main kaise return kara dunga bilkul sir aapko likh ke dena padega reason
Customer: to main likh ke de deta hun aapko theek hai
Executive: ha aur agar hum wo cheez nahi pura kar payenge to main return karunga are aisa thodi na hota sir kaisi baat karte ho aap aap baat kaisi karte ho sir
Customer: main sahi baat barobar mere ko to 10 bar call karke aap bharwa lete ho aapki company 10 bar call karke bharwa leti hai sir aur return karne ke time pe itna sab takleef thodi hota hai sir
Executive: sir return karne ka mere ko sir return chahiye maine bola na sir mere ko return payment are mere ko payment return chahiye sir aapko bol to diya sir mere ko payment return chahiye sir aap likh ke aap likh kar ke do sir mujhe kis reason se main dekhta hun fir kya kar sakta hun sir aap mujhe likh ke sir main apna mail id de raha hun aapko
Customer: are aapko business nahi milega to main return mangunga kya sir nahi mangunga sir business sir business ke liye to main bol raha hun na ki aap lagaiye call customer ko main dekho kaise business nahi ho raha sir aapko
Customer: are sir mere ko nahi lagana sir mera thoda dimag kharab nahi karna sir
Executive: hello sir dekho jabardasti wali aap jabardasti wali cheez kar rahe hain sir is cheez mein aap wahan pe jabardasti wali cheez nahi hai sir mere ko ek hi baat sir mere ko nahi karna business mere ko payment return chahiye sir
Customer: mere ko pura payment mera return chahiye sir
Executive: pura paisa to refund aise bhi nahi hoga sir agar refund hoga bhi to jitne din services chal gaya utna paisa cut kar hi milega aapko
Customer: ha to mere ko refund karwao koi koi baat nahi sir jitna bhi agar koi dusra fir bharega to main usko bol dunga ki Indiamart pe payment nahi bharna sir main bol dunga theek hai sir are sir dekhiye wo alag cheez hai sir wo aap apni baat kariye ha to main bol dunga sir kya ja ke bolenge wo alag baat hai aap apni baat kariye sir main aapko ha to fir mere ko sir aata hai sir mere ko aata hai sir
Customer: barobar theek hai mere ko aap return karwao sir are sir main hath jod ke aapko vinanti karta hun sir mere ko return karwao main hath jod ke vinanti karta hun aapko mere ko return karwao ye do aadi mahine se main ek hi baat kar raha hun sir jis din bhara tha na us din dusre din maine ye call kiya tha
Executive: sir 67 se 68 days ka na aapka paisa katega august mein payment kiya tha do mahina services chala august mein payment kiya tha sir aapne theek hai ha do mahina ka aapka paisa katega august ko kiya tha september ek mahina october do mahina 30 30 60 din aur ye abhi november mein char din chala itna din jitna din service active raha hai utna din ka paisa deduct hoga uske baad paisa jayega aapka
Customer: kitna katega
Executive: sir wo hisab mujhe account se lena padega main aapko mail kar dunga
Customer: aapki company ne to pura payment wapis karne ka bola tha
Executive: nahi sir pura paisa aapko bhi nahi are baat kar lo aap nahi Shailesh ji ko baat kar lo fir Abdul Qadir ko baat kar lo sir
Customer: Abdul ji se bilkul kar leta hun sir Abdul Qadir se baat unhone aapko bola na refund kar lo PM kya aapko aapko full refund ke liye bola tha unhone
Customer: aap baat kar lo na sir
Executive: sir main to bulaunga aapke samne conference call pe le leta hun unko ek minute dijiye conference call pe main bula raha hun unko idhar to
Executive: hello
Executive: ha lijiye Abdul se baat kariye is time mere samne
Customer: hello hello hello ha ji sir ha boliye sir main keh raha hun ki sir maine kya bol diya aapko ki aap full refund ke liye bol rahe hain full refund meri refund ke liye kab baat hui hai aap se refund ke liye bol rahe hain ki bola tha recording dena padega sir main aapko sir recording aap aapne customer ke liye baat ki thi to aapne bola tha customer ke wali ne bola hai ki refund hoga main to aapko bol hi nahi aata ki sir wo refund hoga main to bol raha tha ki wo refund hi nahi ho payega sir
Customer: ha to maine aapko recording bheja tha na us din recording to fir aap mera naam kyun bol rahe hain aapki full payment maine kab bola aapko full payment ke liye sir ji
Customer: to service use nahi hoga to sir refund to milega na sir are service nahi jitne din tak service ek to refund nahi hota hai sir but fir bhi hum aapka refund kara rahe hain jitne din tak service chali utne din tak aapka paisa deduct hoke amount aapka refund ho jayega jitna hoga refund
Executive: wo main bataunga abhi usme time lagega kyunki refund ka procedure hota hai kam se kam 15 to 20 days ka time lagega sir kitna 15 days ka time lagega kam se kam kyunki wo process hoga fir wo ja ke aapka refund hoga main approval ha koi baat nahi kaat lo chalo mere ko kara do return barobar sir baat kar lo aap mere senior se baat kar lo pehle ye process bata do
Executive: hello ha hello ha sir ha boliye dekho ab yahi baat ho gayi hai aapke samne baat ho gayi hai aaj ke din se aapki services band karwa raha hun main band karke main aapka refund ka initial start karwata hun theek hai aapko jitna amount deduct ho raha hai kitna nahi ho raha uska pura details main aapko email pe share karwaunga pehle mere ko message dalo jitna refund aayega pehle mere ko message dalo uske baad service off karo sir pehle mere ko sir main nahi bhej sakta main nahi hun accounts team calculate karegi services jab band ho jayengi tabhi refund ka process start hoga
Customer: aisa nahi lekin kitna aayega wo mere ko sir laga lo na aapne 3340 diya tha per day ke hisab se 90 jata hai 91 jata hai 91 do mahine ka jod lo do mahine ka aapko jayega kariban kitna jata hai 90 ke sath kariban to kitna jayega
Customer: kariban 6000 ke aas pass katega sir paisa aapka kitna 6000 kahan se 6000 katega sir jod lijiye na sir
Customer: ek second ruko
Customer: itna sab thodi katega sir
Executive: sir kya calculation kiya aapne bataye jara ha sir kya calculate kiya tha aapne itna sab itna sab kyun katega
Executive: are aapne 3340 diye the sir usko 335 se divide kariye per day ka 90 aapko 91 jayega per day 91 ke hisab se do mahina chala tab yahan pe jodiye 67 din chala hai 67 din ko multiply kar 91 dekhiye kitna aa raha hai kitna din chala
Executive: 68 67 67 ko aaj aap allow karenge tabhi dekhiye kitna aa raha hai sir itna paisa to katega sir jitna service chala hai
Customer: koi baat nahi karwa do chalo
Executive: theek hai sir okay karwa do theek hai ha
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for Indiamart subscription.

- Feels misled by Indiamart representative.

- Business not converting into sales.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to initiate refund process.

- Refund amount will be calculated after deducting service charges.

- Customer needs to provide a written reason for refund.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide written refund reason.

- Executive will share refund details via email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, payment
